Articles.Content: Even more hype!

Add some more boosters! Sorry no pic.
The hype train is now a relativistic kill vehicle! [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Relativistic_kill_vehicle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Relativistic_kill_vehicle)
when this thread ends... do we have an HECO? Hype Engines Cut Off?

The F5'ing is real!!
